Package fr.iutvalence.info.but.s2_01.jrava.model

Class ActivityTracker

java.lang.Object
fr.iutvalence.info.but.s2_01.jrava.model.ActivityTracker
public class ActivityTracker extends Object
Activity tracker. Activities are cached in memory, and also stored/retrieved using a pluggable storage service.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sebastien Jean

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ActivityTracker()
    Creates a new activity tracker, with a "no storage" service and initially no activity.

  • Constructor Details

    • ActivityTracker

      public ActivityTracker()
      Creates a new activity tracker, with a "no storage" service and initially no activity.

  • Method Details

    • setStorage

      public void setStorage(Storage storage) throws StorageAccessException
      Sets the storage service to be used. N.B. activity cache is erased, activities are reloaded using storage service
      Parameters:
      storage - storage service to use
      Throws:
      StorageAccessException - if storage access failed while reloading activities

    • reloadActivities

      private void reloadActivities() throws StorageAccessException
      Reloads activities (in cache) from storage service.
      Throws:
      StorageAccessException - if storage access failed while reloading activities

    • addActivity

      public int addActivity(Activity activity)
      Adds a new activity in cache, also saved using storage service.
      Parameters:
      activity - activity
      Returns:
      activity id, or -1 if activity could not be saved

    • getStats

      public ActivityStats getStats(ActivityType type)
      Returns statistical data, for a given activity type.
      Parameters:
      type - activity type
      Returns:
      statistical data for given activity type

    • getStats

      public ActivityStats getStats()
      Returns statistical data, for a all activities.
      Returns:
      statistical data, for all activities

    • getActivityCount

      public int getActivityCount()
      Returns cached activity count.
      Returns:
      activity count

    • getActivities

      public Map<Integer,Activity> getActivities()
      Returns a copy of all cached activities.
      Returns:
      a copy of all cached activities

    • getActivitiesByType

      public Map<Integer,Activity> getActivitiesByType(ActivityType type)
      Returns a copy of all cached activities of given type.
      Parameters:
      type - activity type
      Returns:
      a copy of all cached activities of given type

    • getActivityById

      public Activity getActivityById(int id)
      Returns a cached activity from its given id, if it exists.
      Parameters:
      id - activity id
      Returns:
      activity of given id if it exists, null else

    • updateActivityTitle

      public void updateActivityTitle(int activityId, String title) throws StorageAccessException
      Updates title of an activity, given its id.
      Parameters:
      activityId - activity id
      title - new title
      Throws:
      StorageAccessException - if storage access failed while saving activity

    • updateActivityDescription

      public void updateActivityDescription(int activityId, String description) throws StorageAccessException
      Updates description of an activity, given its id.
      Parameters:
      activityId - activity id
      description - new description
      Throws:
      StorageAccessException - if storage access failed while saving activity
